content.p: Studying our shared human past with us opens up vast opportunities to discover fascinating cultures and explore the making of the modern world. At Nottingham, you can study ancient history, classics or archaeology as stand-alone subjects or as part of a joint honours degree with another subject. Single honours courses: Joint honours courses: Apply now Liberal Arts Foundation route Discover campus life at the University of Nottingham with 360 degree images and videos on our virtual tour. Experience student life by exploring areas such as accommodation, student services, sport centres, libraries and more. Contact details Archaeology twitter Classics twitter
